alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Eastern Lincoln County; Far Northwest Highlands; Jemez Mountains; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 04 at 2:10PM MDT until April 05 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Northwest Plateau, Chuska Mountains, Far Northwest Highlands, Northwest Highlands, West Central Plateau, Jemez Mountains, South Central Highlands, South Central Mountains, and Eastern Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust will reduce visibility on area roadways. This includes Interstates 25 and 40 as well as U.S. Highways 380 and 550.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Eastern Lincoln County; Far Northwest Highlands; Jemez Mountains; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
